Naming/MethodParameterName.description:
Description

Checks for method parameter names that contain capital letters, end in numbers, or do not meet a minimal length.
Naming/MethodParameterName.option:
This rule supports the following parameters in your configuration:

MinNameLength: 3 (type: int)
AllowNamesEndingInNumbers: True (type: bool)
AllowedNames: ['as', 'at', 'by', 'cc', 'db', 'id', 'if', 'in', 'io', 'ip', 'of', 'on', 'os', 'pp', 'to'] (type: list)
ForbiddenNames: [] (type: list)
